text: Draft @ CBC 2016. Pours a hazy pale yellow color with no head. Has a fruity spicy pear honey rice aroma. Fruity spicy pear flavor. Has a fruity spicy honey pear finish.

Fruity aroma and taste with prominent notes of pear, rice, notes of grape, light lacto, fruity pear finish.
From tap. Hazy yellow colour without a head. Aroma and flavour of fruit, honey, rice, apples and sourness.

Draught @ CBC 2016 [ Yellow Session ]. - Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016, Oksnehallen Vesterbro, Halmtorvet 11, 1700 Copenhagen, Denmark. [ As Sahtipaja Raising San ].Unclear light yellow almost white color with virtually no head. Aroma is moderate to light heavy rice, fruity, citrus. Flavor is moderate sweet with a long duration, tart, citrus, rice, refreshing. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is flat. [20160513]

November 6, 2015. On tap at All In Beer Fest. 
Light hazy pale pear colored. Aroma is fruity and grainy with boiled rice, pear, lemon, floral perfume notes and a touch of alcohol. Taste is light sweet with a fruity tartness. Finish is light sour with some lemon, gooseberries and a touch of yoghurt, some sweet pear and rice notes, minerals. Light bodied, dry and fizzy carbonation.

Draught @ CBC 2016. Pours champagne, no head. Aroma of light sournes, rice, light honey, light fruit. Flavor is light sour, rice, lacto, fruit. Medium body, average carbonation, light sour finish. 130516
Keg at mikkeller bar... Hazy Amber.. Thin white lacing soft dry fruit nose.. Sour tart fruit... Soft dry apple fruit.. Quite sour.. Light rice sake finish
CBC. Unclear pale champagne with no head. Aroma is rice, fruits and perfume. Flavour is rice, perfume,almond, spices and lacto.
CBC. Hazy very pale yellow without head. Aroma is sweet, rice, lactic and alcohol. Flavor is quite sweet. Sweet finish with alcohol. 130516

Hazy kind of white colour, no head. Aroma is rice, some floral notes, mild citrus and quite big time lactic. Flavour is floral, some rice, mild toffee as well as some mild earthiness.
Sample at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Light greenish yellow shade. Barely a head. Orchard fruit notes. A mild sourness in the midst of the taste. Light pear notes. Quite tasty.

On tap at CBC. Really pale color. Aroma has a bit of alcohol, grains and lemon. Taste is a good combination of sweet and sour, grainy, with a slight alcohol finish. Body is light, dry and effervescent. My first ever sake and I have to say its a really interesting style. I will look out for more.
On tap at CBC 2016. Almost transparent white, like a lemonade. Tastes like citrus and green vegetable, dry and crisp.

On tap at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Very pale lightly cloudy. Aroma is lemon yoghurt, rice pudding. Light bodied, crisp on the palate with a hint of sweetness. Taste is lemon yoghurt, rice pudding, sweet white wine, pear juice.
From tap. Pours hazy pale yellow with no head. Citric. Fruity. Citric. Dry. Lingering sourish fruity finish.
Yellow session, Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Very pale, almost no head. Fruity aroma, caramel, sourish, some water melo. Fruity flavor, some slight spices, grape notes. Ok.

@Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016, YELLOWwhite hazy, sakeish colour. Rice koji, light green melonsome lime on nose. Med bodied, quite clean, mouthwatering nice. Light refreshing summer sake.-- rated with beerbasher/winphone
Tap at CBC2016, Copenhagen. Colour is slightly cloudy pale with no head. Aromas and flavors: Sweetness, rice, some fruits and some alcohol.
Tap@ CBC 2016. Pours pale straw color, no head. Water melon, citrusy light aroma. Flavor has water melon, some fruits, earth. Not for me.

How: Draught.
Where: All in Beer Fest 2015.
Appearance: Hazy pale yellow colour with a small white head.
Aroma: Fruit, spices, a bit sour.
Body: Medium body, flat carbonation.
Flavour: Fruit, pear, citrus, a bit sour.
Sample at All In Beer Fest. Hazy pale yellow with no head. Tart, fruity smell and taste of green apple, light pear, sour citrus. Dry finish with more lemon and green apple zest.

Draught @ All In Beer Fest 2015. Pours tiny sparkling hazy rice water white with no head worth mentioning leaving some subtle legs on the glass. Smell is fruity with sticky rice, asian pear, hay, minerals, lemon peal and hints of alcohol and bubbelgum. Taste is sour and fruity. mouthfeel is dry, tart, sparkling and light to medium bodied. Finish is sour with rice cakes, asian pear, lemon juice, fruit yoghurt, minerals and lemon peal. Really cool and clean infused sparkling sake. Im no sake expert cant duduce if this is on style but I like it nonetheless.
On tap at All In Beer Fest. Yeasty smell with apples, fruity and spicy. Also a bit boozy. Similar taste with lots of apples.

Draught at All In Beer Fest 2015, cons 2015-11-06 Göteborg 
AR: sour citrus
AP: grenish golden hazy, no head
F: home brewed wine, wee sweetness, 
And a new style - thx Timo!

Draught at All In Beer Fest 2015. Light hazy pale grape liquid with small white head. Aroma of grapes, light pear, lacto, apples, light grain and lemon. Taste is dry and medium sour with notes of lemons, grape, pears and light grain. Light to medium bodied with high carbonation. Cool stuff! Tasty as well.
